angstd.model.arrangement
Class Domain

java.lang.Object
  angstd.model.arrangement.Domain
All Implemented Interfaces:
AngstdData, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Domain
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, AngstdData

Class Domain is the representing data structure for domains.

the parameters gained from the input format are stored in here and the domain sequences are automatically assigned, if a sequence is assigned to the arrangement.

Each domain is assigned to just one arrangement and the cross reference is made because it is needed in layouting details.

Author:
Andreas Held

getFamID

setSequence

public void setSequence(int fromWithGaps,
                        SequenceI seq)
Sets the amino acid sequence for this domain and a new starting point. This is because the parameters from xdom files never take gaps into account.

Parameters:
fromWithGaps - new start point in a gapped protein sequence
seq - sequence from which a subsequence is gained
